name: docxtemplater-image-hyperlink-module-free
description: Open Source Image Module for docxtemplater with Hyperlink support
author: lucaloiacono

scripts.compile: rimraf build/node && mkdirp build/node && babel src --out-dir build/node
scripts.preversion: npm test && npm run browserify && npm run uglify
scripts.test: npm run compile && npm run test:compiled
scripts.browserify: rimraf build/browser && mkdirp build/browser && browserify --insert-global-vars __filename,__dirname -r ./build/node/index.js -s ImageModule > build/browser/imagemodule.js
